resources.string: You can cancel at any time
(Monthly 1,54 USD for 12 months. More than 15% discount)

By choosing the monthly or annual subscription button below, you agree to start your membership immediately and to cancel the contract and get a refund within the first 14 days as long as you do not access the digital content on the Disney+ Service. You will be charged a monthly or annual fee on a recurring basis. You can cancel your subscription at any time, effective from the end of the billing period. No refunds or credits are given for partially used months or years.
